name: Lunaria (Chao)
description:
It's an RPG about something not sure where it's going yet.
There is very likely 100% some bug that I didn't find when testing.

If you found somewhere where you can get stuck of softlocked, please tell me about it @ChaosSpam on Twitter!

Or just leave a comment right here!

Thanks,
Chao

Install

Extract the .zip file, and launch Lunaria.exe to play!!!
